Esther Mitchell n/a

  2. Foster Family: Mike and Margaret W. Wortman
  3. Location of Family: Wahoo, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: West Point, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-03-16, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2002-10-21, West Point, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Esther Wortman
  11. Spouse Name: Rudolph H. Wortman
